alert.note: Alert for Garfield; Iron; Kane; Piute; Sevier (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 11 at 11:32AM MDT until further notice by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...Forecast flooding changed from Minor to Moderate severity for the following rivers in Utah... Sevier River Near Hatch affecting Sevier, Iron, Kane, Piute and Garfield Counties. .Warm temperatures will continue to melt snowpack and increase river flows. For the Sevier River...including Hatch...Moderate flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING FOR SNOWMELT REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Moderate flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Sevier River Near Hatch. * WHEN...Until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 3.9 feet, minor flooding will affect fields. Assorted bridges and select low lying structures will receive minor flood damage. At 4.3 feet, moderate flooding will affect fields, roads and bridges along low lying stretches of the Sevier River. Additionally, structures in low lying areas will receive flood damage. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 10:15 AM MDT Thursday the stage was 3.7 feet. - The river stage has been relatively steady this morning, above action stage. - Forecast...The river stage is expected to remain above action stage, reaching minor flood stage Saturday morning, moderate flood stage as early as next Thursday morning. - Flood stage is 3.9 feet. &&
info.instruction: Please report observed flooding to local emergency services or law enforcement and request they pass this information to the National Weather Service when you can do so safely. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued this evening at 1145 PM MDT.
